class.name: CSGMesh2D
class.description: A 2D CSG node that allows creating a shape for the 2D CSG system based on the geometry of a 2D rendering mesh resource. [b]Performance:[/b] CSG nodes are only intended for prototyping as they have a significant CPU performance cost. Consider baking final CSG operation results into static geometry that replaces the CSG nodes. This can be done using the various [b]Bake[/b] options available in the [b]CSG2D[/b] menu at the top of the 2D editor viewport after selecting a 2D CSG node.

members.member: The rendering mesh resource which geometry is used to construct the CSG shape. The mesh must use the format [constant RenderingServer.ARRAY_FLAG_USE_2D_VERTICES].
